reviews.name: Lion Brand Wool-Ease Yarn
reviews.reviewText: Very soft and works up well in almost all of the projects I make. One of my favorite yarns.
reviews.title: 09 December 2012

reviews.name: Lion Brand Wool-Ease Yarn
reviews.reviewText: I love this yarn! It is soft enough for knitting baby things and is machine washable while having just a touch of wool to make it warm. My only complaint would be that I wish it came in more colors.
reviews.title: 25 January 2013

reviews.name: Lion Brand Wool-Ease Yarn
reviews.reviewText:
I love this yarn--80% acrylic, 20% wool. The amount of wool gives the finished product a wool look; however, it can be washed and dried in machines and will NOT shrink. Great for baby items, that need to be washed a lot. I have used this yarn for many years and the items I made with it have held up--they look like new, haven't faded or frayed. This yarn is not as available as it used to be in stores; however, I now get it on-line. I am loyal fan of Wool-Ease, worsted weight, Lion Brand Yarn. After spending a lot of time knitting something, I want the item to last and this yarn definitely does.
Sincerely, A joyful knitter
reviews.title: great product: great look, won't shrink

reviews.name: Lion Brand Wool-Ease Yarn
reviews.reviewText:
You saved the day, I had run out of the yarn and it was discontinued by the manufacturer.
Walmart still had it in stock so I was able to finish the sweater for my grandson in time.
Thanks so much!!
reviews.title: 02 October 2013

reviews.name: Lion Brand Wool-Ease Yarn
reviews.reviewText: The only problem I have with ordering on line is: I am a long term associated and It will not give me a discount when ordering on line! I have to return the product and then re-buy the merchandise. When I purchased the product on line It was a different price at the store that I was returning it to. It was in there system but they do not carry, plus It was about $10.00 less in the store system? I really like to order on line but hate the hassle of going to customer service for a discount!! Please can you help me? This is the second request on the discount situation!!!
reviews.title: like this yarn
